I'm having a regular problem with your downloads missing the audio codec.  Is it something I'm doing?  I'm downloading the entire file.  It is not happening all the time.

@ NXiL2009

R u trying to merge both files with VirtualDub? You might end up losing some or even all of the audio if you mess up on that end, if so jus google a step by step tutorial 4 it. (very easy by the way)

If not... well what media player u using? U may have to either update or change it... personally I never have problems with ARROW releases so I can't offer much help 4 this, so good luck with getting the audio 2 wrk.

Thanks!!!

NXiL2009 use VLC Media Player or Media Player Classic. They come with just about all the codecs you will need.
